title.narrative: ML- Governance and Budget Decentralization Technical Assistance Project

description.narrative: The development objective of the Governance and Budget Decentralization TA Project (TA) is to strengthen capacity for public financial management at decentralized level for improved budgetary decision-making and enhanced transparency and oversight.

participating-org.narrative: Ministere de l'Economie et des Finances
